duties_responsibilities.duty: Gather engineering objectives, program information, schedules, and constraints to develop test plans, schedules, and resource requirements.
Maintain and improve project objectives and goals for subsystem and system testing.
Implement and maintain standards and procedures for testing, applying knowledge of industry standards and best practices.
Assist in analyzing system requirements and reviewing technical product/project specifications for overall test objectives.
Review and report data/metrics obtained during testing activities to ensure consistency with policies and procedures.
Identify and develop new approaches to solve problems in the testing process.
Support the design and development of board and system level automated test fixtures, software programs, and procedures.
Provide interface between engineering and manufacturing departments during the transitioning of new products from design phase to production phase.
